rules_text:
Vigilance
[i]Gilded Aegis[/i] – Oswin, Hector's Shield enters with three shield counters on him. [i](If a permanent with a shield counter on it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)[/i]
[i]Undaunted Call[/i] – Whenever another creature attacks, you may move a counter from Oswin onto that creature. If you do, that creature gains trample until end of turn.
